response.msg:
嗯，用户想要了解高铁宠物托运的指南。我需要整理一下搜索结果中的信息，结合时效性和权威性，给用户提供全面且可靠的指南。

首先看最新的信息。根据结果1和结果35，现在全国有40个高铁站可以办理宠物托运，部分列车旁边有"宠"字标识，购票后会自动显示托运入口。这是2025年11月的信息，时效性很强。另外结果44提到截至10月底已经累计托运4757单，说明服务已经有一定规模。

关于办理流程，结果18详细说明了在12306APP的操作步骤：购票后进入"宠物托运"入口，预约下单，填写宠物信息，提交审核。审核结果会在2小时内通过短信通知。这里引用多个结果相互印证流程。

托运条件方面，多个结果都提到宠物必须是家庭驯养的猫狗，体重不超过15公斤，肩高不超过40厘米。需要有效的《动物检疫合格证明》，这个证明需要在县级动物卫生监督机构办理，包含狂犬疫苗接种记录。结果28特别强调了检疫证明的要求。

费用标准在结果9和结果15都有说明，按里程阶梯计价，1000公里内360元，1000-1500公里460元，1500-2000公里660元，2000公里以上860元。这是7折优惠价，还包含2000元基础保险。

运输过程的安全措施在结果14和结果62有详细介绍：专用运输箱有空气循环和温湿度监测，放置在中部车厢的快运柜，与乘客隔离。工作人员每2小时巡视，可以加水但不喂食。结果19明确说明全程不能探视，以防宠物应激。

特别值得注意的是结果60提到南昌西站的最新政策：预约时间缩短到提前1天，每人可托运的宠物数量增加到2只。这可能是服务优化的新动向，值得包含在指南中。

最后整理常见问题：结果6提到要提前训练宠物适应运输箱，托运前4-6小时禁食；结果39说明重庆西站新增了托运服务；结果44介绍单独托运需要提前2-5天拨打95572预约。


以下是截至2025年11月的高铁宠物托运全指南，整合最新政策及实操要点：
### 一、服务覆盖范围
1. **开通站点与车次**
- 全国**40座高铁站**已开通服务（如北京南、上海虹桥、厦门北、重庆西、合肥南等），覆盖**50趟以上列车**。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 4, "data": {"num": [1, 37, 42, 50, 59], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228436530660024", "index": 1, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "央视财经", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228265111294081", "index": 37, "label": ""}, {"name": "白山发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228468216534225", "index": 42, "label": ""}, {"name": "是纳不是哪", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228463822734441", "index": 50, "label": ""}, {"name": "Mengz屿义栀聆", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228461522159485", "index": 59, "label": ""}], "name": "央视新闻", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.690.690.50/002TLsr9ly8i653ifvwbtj60j60j6aai02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762058408&ssig=XeEh5juHk1", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228436530660024", "vType": 3}}```
- 购票时注意列车旁带 **“宠”字绿色标识**（如G119、G1377等），表示该车次支持托运。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 5, "data": {"num": [35, 37, 59], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "每日经济新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228169171828973", "index": 35, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "央视财经", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228265111294081", "index": 37, "label": ""}, {"name": "Mengz屿义栀聆", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228461522159485", "index": 59, "label": ""}], "name": "每日经济新闻", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/001NBLkrly8h8viaqqljmj60go0gomxj02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762058408&ssig=auyHE8hzIc", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228169171828973", "vType": 3}}```

2. **适用宠物要求**
- **品种限制**：仅限家庭驯养的健康猫、犬，**禁运烈性犬、野生猫类及杂交烈性犬**（如藏獒、比特犬等47类）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 7, "data": {"num": [15, 31], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "锋潮科技", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153088000754994", "index": 15, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "一只小西测评", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228465956587815", "index": 31, "label": ""}], "name": "锋潮科技", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/6b1394a6ly8gdj69cqcx8j20u00u0dhh.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762058408&ssig=HlSTRYkxj3", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153088000754994", "vType": 0}}```
- **体型标准**：单只体重≤15公斤、肩高≤40厘米。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 8, "data": {"num": [2, 5, 23, 34], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153073417685007", "index": 2, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "仙狗嗨炸了", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153170084594202", "index": 5, "label": ""}, {"name": "游戏圈资讯君", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153167852175410", "index": 23, "label": ""}, {"name": "吃货的捡肥梦", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228455966278520", "index": 34, "label": ""}], "name": "人民日报", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1018.1018.50/0033ImPzly8h8vgemh8kxj60sa0sadgw02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762058409&ssig=qZBFh6MzHM", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153073417685007", "vType": 3}}```
- **健康状态**：禁运怀孕、哺乳期、未满15周或生病的宠物。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 9, "data": {"num": [15, 31], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "一只小西测评", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228465956587815", "index": 31, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "锋潮科技", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153088000754994", "index": 15, "label": ""}], "name": "一只小西测评", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.540.540.50/5397a74bly8hq009rlm60j20f00f0t98.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762058408&ssig=i8KSGvmPs7", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228465956587815", "vType": 0}}```
人民日报
每日经济新闻
央视财经
游戏圈资讯君
仙狗嗨炸了

### 二、办理全流程
1. **预约阶段**
- **人宠同车**：通过12306 App购票后，页面自动显示“宠物托运”入口 → 选择车次/日期 → 填写宠物信息 → 提交审核（2小时内短信通知结果）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 13, "data": {"num": [1, 18, 35, 42], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228436530660024", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153180451866382", "index": 18, "label": ""}, {"name": "每日经济新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228169171828973", "index": 35, "label": ""}, {"name": "白山发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228468216534225", "index": 42, "label": ""}]}}```
- **宠物单飞**：未购票时，提前2-5天拨打**95572电话预约**，可单独托运1只宠物。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 14, "data": {"num": [1, 42, 44], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "Chanyeolvv", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228467494849194", "index": 44, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228436530660024", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "白山发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228468216534225", "index": 42, "label": ""}], "name": "Chanyeolvv", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/c4564113ly8i5gwr38hlhj20e80e874q.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762058408&ssig=VZus%2FnBEEb", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228467494849194", "vType": 0}}```
- **预约时效**：部分站点（如南昌西站）已优化为最早提前1天预约。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 15, "data": {"num": [60], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "从KHN起飞XIONG大熊", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227107481026783", "index": 60, "label": "大v"}], "name": "从KHN起飞XIONG大熊", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.583.583.50/7cece7b3ly8hw0v56ces0j20g70g7t9o.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762058408&ssig=c26Yacb3JU", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227107481026783", "vType": 0}}```

2. **证件准备**
- **必需文件**：
- 托运人身份证原件及车票（人宠同车时需同车次同区间）；
- 有效期内的 **《动物检疫合格证明》**（需县级动物卫生监督所开具，含狂犬疫苗接种记录）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 19, "data": {"num": [6, 21, 34], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "搞笑研究生", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5158914275936999", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "阿森正能量", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153482069510111", "index": 21, "label": ""}, {"name": "吃货的捡肥梦", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228455966278520", "index": 34, "label": ""}]}}```

3. **乘车当日操作**
- **提前2-6小时**到车站“中铁快运营业部”办理手续，核验宠物及文件。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 21, "data": {"num": [15, 18, 42], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "锋潮科技", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153088000754994", "index": 15, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153180451866382", "index": 18, "label": ""}, {"name": "白山发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228468216534225", "index": 42, "label": ""}]}}```
- 现场使用铁路提供的**专用运输箱**（尺寸60×45×46cm，带新风/温湿度监测系统）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 22, "data": {"num": [4, 42, 62], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "澎湃新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153190103483325", "index": 4, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "白山发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228468216534225", "index": 42, "label": ""}, {"name": "新华网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153947908574980", "index": 62, "label": ""}], "name": "澎湃新闻", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.11.10.275.275.50/005vnhZYly8ftjmwo0bx4j308c08cq32.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762058409&ssig=qXf6q4%2BxJE", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153190103483325", "vType": 3}}```
- 抵达后凭身份证及短信提示**1小时内领取宠物**。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 23, "data": {"num": [15, 34], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "锋潮科技", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153088000754994", "index": 15, "label": ""}, {"name": "吃货的捡肥梦", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228455966278520", "index": 34, "label": ""}]}}```
人民日报
搞笑研究生
澎湃新闻

### 三、费用与安全保障
1. **收费标准**（试点期7折优惠）：
| 里程 | 原价（元） | 优惠价（元） |
|---------------|------------|--------------|
| ≤1000公里 | 558 | 360 |
| 1000-1500公里 | 658 | 460 |
| ≥2000公里 | 1258 | 860 |

```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 26, "data": {"num": [9, 15, 34], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视财经", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5196261730816039", "index": 9, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "锋潮科技", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153088000754994", "index": 15, "label": ""}, {"name": "吃货的捡肥梦", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228455966278520", "index": 34, "label": ""}], "name": "央视财经", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.700.700.50/002sRokily8h8vg8b1kf7j60jg0jgwf602.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762058408&ssig=XgoupWkHqp", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5196261730816039", "vType": 3}}```
- **包含服务**：赠送保额2000元的基础保险（含宠物死亡/丢失理赔）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 27, "data": {"num": [14, 15, 34], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153271128791464", "index": 14, "label": ""}, {"name": "锋潮科技", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153088000754994", "index": 15, "label": ""}, {"name": "吃货的捡肥梦", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228455966278520", "index": 34, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **运输安全保障**
- **智能设备**：运输箱配备空气循环、温湿度/含氧量实时监测，异常自动报警。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 29, "data": {"num": [4, 9, 62], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "新华网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153947908574980", "index": 62, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "澎湃新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153190103483325", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "央视财经", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5196261730816039", "index": 9, "label": ""}], "name": "新华网", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.8.11.119.119.50/0034c2ttly8h8vg8d8h2ij6046046q2t02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762058409&ssig=lY2K4EwMMx", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153947908574980", "vType": 3}}```
- **独立存放**：宠物箱放置列车中部专用快运柜，与乘客车厢隔离。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 30, "data": {"num": [2, 19, 23], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "九派新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153221993304981", "index": 19, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153073417685007", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "游戏圈资讯君", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153167852175410", "index": 23, "label": ""}], "name": "九派新闻", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/008cHdLily8h8vgz2g178j30go0go0tm.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762058408&ssig=kSUeyhte0X", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153221993304981", "vType": 3}}```
- **专人看护**：押运员每2小时巡视，补充饮水（不喂食）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 31, "data": {"num": [14, 19, 42], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153271128791464", "index": 14, "label": ""}, {"name": "九派新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153221993304981", "index": 19, "label": ""}, {"name": "白山发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228468216534225", "index": 42, "label": ""}]}}```
央视财经

### 四、关键注意事项
1. **降低宠物应激**
- 提前训练宠物适应航空箱，放入带有主人气味的旧衣物。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 35, "data": {"num": [34, 59], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "吃货的捡肥梦", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228455966278520", "index": 34, "label": ""}, {"name": "Mengz屿义栀聆", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228461522159485", "index": 59, "label": ""}]}}```
- 托运前**4-6小时禁食**，避免晕车呕吐；禁用镇静药物。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 36, "data": {"num": [15, 31, 34], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "锋潮科技", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153088000754994", "index": 15, "label": ""}, {"name": "一只小西测评", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228465956587815", "index": 31, "label": ""}, {"name": "吃货的捡肥梦", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228455966278520", "index": 34, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **时效与政策**
- 车票改签/退票将**自动取消托运预约**。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 38, "data": {"num": [31], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "一只小西测评", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228465956587815", "index": 31, "label": ""}]}}```
- 部分城市（如北京）高铁站属“禁犬区域”，需提前确认属地法规。

3. **其他限制**
- 每人最多托运 **1-2只宠物**（需同车次，南昌西站已试点2只）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 41, "data": {"num": [60], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "从KHN起飞XIONG大熊", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227107481026783", "index": 60, "label": ""}]}}```
- 到站后需**3小时内领取宠物**，超时可能产生寄养费。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 42, "data": {"num": [31, 42], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "一只小西测评", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228465956587815", "index": 31, "label": ""}, {"name": "白山发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228468216534225", "index": 42, "label": ""}]}}```
### 五、最新优化（2025年10月更新）
- **预约提速**：由提前2天调整为可预约次日/第三日仓位。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 45, "data": {"num": [60], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "从KHN起飞XIONG大熊", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227107481026783", "index": 60, "label": ""}]}}```
- **覆盖扩展**：新增太原南、合肥南、南宁东等15座车站。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 46, "data": {"num": [42, 60], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "白山发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228468216534225", "index": 42, "label": ""}, {"name": "从KHN起飞XIONG大熊", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227107481026783", "index": 60, "label": ""}]}}```
- **非购票托运**：未购票旅客可电话预约“单飞”服务，按原价收费。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 47, "data": {"num": [35, 60], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "每日经济新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228169171828973", "index": 35, "label": ""}, {"name": "从KHN起飞XIONG大熊", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227107481026783", "index": 60, "label": ""}]}}```

> 提示：出行前务必通过12306 App“宠物托运”专栏或拨打95572确认最新政策，部分站点要求宠物植入芯片（建议提前咨询）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 48, "data": {"num": [21, 34, 42], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "阿森正能量", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5153482069510111", "index": 21, "label": ""}, {"name": "吃货的捡肥梦", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228455966278520", "index": 34, "label": ""}, {"name": "白山发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228468216534225", "index": 42, "label": ""}]}}```
